extendedInfo.description: Ever feel like you are missing something? Maybe you cracked a joke and you feel like there should be an audience laughing for you or the da da ching noise. Ever have the urge to have a truck backing up noise for someone walking backwards or booing when they say something stupid? Look no further, your life shall not go without sound effects any longer and all you have to do is hit LIFE'S BUTTON!Currently with 15 sound effects, each of which you can save as a ringtone or notification.Are there sounds that you feel are missing from Life's Button? Feel free to email your requests to FallacyStudios@gmail.com.TAGS: button, funny, joke, applause, soundboard, sound, noise, back up, fat, ding, boing, boo, booing, crickets, fail, flatline, forget, money, rewind, shutup, suspense, whine
